definition: To add information or record something in an organized manner, typically into a designated space or document, often involving personal details or data. This action is commonly performed in official records, registers, or schedules.

examples.german: Ich trage meinen Namen in das Formular ein.
examples.english: I enter my name into the form.

examples.german: Bitte tragen Sie Ihre Adresse in das Adressfeld ein.
examples.english: Please enter your address into the address field.

examples.german: Er trägt seine Gedanken in sein Tagebuch ein.
examples.english: He records his thoughts in his diary.

examples.german: Kannst du den Termin in den Kalender eintragen?
examples.english: Can you enter the appointment into the calendar?

examples.german: Sie müssen Ihre Daten in das System eintragen.
examples.english: You need to enter your data into the system.
